title: Teapot And Cover, ca. 1726–30
markings: Underglaze blue mark (see catalog card for image): An elongated "X" shape with shorter top than bottom; crossing through bottom is small "V" shape - the effect is a diagonal with all lines moving past crossing points of shape.
description: Globous, with short gilded hexagonal spout and double-scrolled handle. Flat-domed cover with gilded knob. Engraved gilt chinoiserie decoration of figures with scrollwork.

tombstone.epitaph: Teapot And Cover, ca. 1726–30.Porcelain with overglaze gilt decoration.. Bequest of Erskine Hewitt. 1938-57-634-a,b.
